## Minimal Dataset

For all participating studies, we defined a minimal dataset, which can be downloaded [here](/data/minimal_data_set_2022.xlsx). This file __includes__ metadata of every variable

The needed variables can be split into two important parts:

* methodology (used instruments, type of recritment, etc.)
* case based minimal information (gender, age, etc.)


```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
df <- read_excel("../../static/data/minimal_data_set_2022.xlsx")

df %>% 
  select(Category = 1, Variable = 2) %>% 
  fill(Category, .direction = "down") %>% 
  filter(!is.na(Variable)) %>% 
  knitr::kable() %>% 
  kableExtra::kable_styling("striped")
```
